name: Project TD
description:
A game developed solo by a student to improve my game dev skills.

Known Issues
  • Once in a level, you cannot leave. You must either finish the level or close the app.
  • The pause button in-game has very limited functionality and no UI to help distinguish  game status
  • UI alignment issues on multiple screens
  • No in-game tutorial yet
  • The settings button is disabled (not developed  yet)
  • Upgrade prices are not shown anywhere to the player
  • End-of-level UI not showing appropriate text
Tutorial

Since the game has no tutorial explaining the details, here is what you can do in the game:

  • Click on a tower type, then click on an empty building slot
  • To upgrade/ sell a tower, click on it and use the corresponding button
  • Levels require all previous levels to be completed before becoming playable
  • A finished level will be marked
  • In-game, there are two buttons on the top right, one to send the next round, and the other, to pause/ unpause.
